# BEGIN_BODY

Almost 10 years later, the magnificent song from Kingdom Hearts II always manage to make me weep a bit. Damn, the feels. Even among the truly great games I have played, Kingdom Hearts II was straight up on a whole another level.

https://youtu.be/kT-YtuzNqIY

Had to hyperlink instead of embed the video because, y'know, copyright.
